::KitKat::

"Yeah, take the side hatch. It was supposed to be for escape only, 
but go ahead and use it.  It will take you to the pod faster as well."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit heard KitKat's request, and walked to the main room.
> "Sure. Is there an exit, on that end? I dont want to go through 
those
> Maximals." He said.
> DrillBit was a bit upset with himself, for letting that Maximal 
stick
> his gun right in his face.
